overview: When you last left our foxy, intrepid explorers, they were far from the city and in the midst of a hot, sweaty, sexy adventure called Christy In The Wild. Now Racquel Darrian joins the group, just in time to save the hikers from the bikers, in the thrilling climax to The Wilds. You're going to be a very happy camper.
title: Racquel in the Wild
